description: BaBatchas Design Studio is an interior design office located in Athens, Greece. It specializes in the study of private residents, luxury accommodation and commercial spaces while at the same time creating design objects, custommade furniture and pieces of art. Chrysi Makri and Nefeli Gkyzi are the co-founders of BaBatchas Design Studio.

Chrysi is an interior architect with over a decade experience in high end residential and hospitality projects as well as commercial ones. After a successful career in the UK that resulted in her working in high end residential projects around the world she has returned to Greece to focus on five star hospitality projects in Greece and Asia. Nefeli is an interior designer with a rigid background in large scale commercial projects in Germany where she gained an organized business profile and a management talent. She returned to her routes in Greece to get involved in luxury hospitality projects and residences.

Once their business routes had collided, their shared passion in interiors and art motivated them to create a collective where design ideas and forms could flourish and develope. Their shared vision is creating interiors that evoke emotions and remain honest and close to their context and location.Their shared love for their country’s tradition as well as Greece’s local beauties and peculiarities has guided them towards creating interior design suggestions that create a warm familiar feeling spiced up by a new, refreshing outtake.
